onna man me wathawe oyalata denna yanne tikak wadagath deyak.ee thamayi samanya janathawa widiyata danagathayuthu nithimaya karunu kihipayak gana ada man oyalawa danuwath karannayi yanne.edineda jiwithaye di apita samahara siddin nisa polisiyata yanna wenawa.polisiye pihita pathanna wenawa.ithin polisiya samanga ganudenu karaddi api nithiya gana danagena innawanam eeka apita godak prayojanawath.apita wena atham asadharanakamwalin midennath eeka godak iwahal wewi kiyalayi magenam hangima.aandukrama wyawasthawen apata labadi thibena ayithiwasikam saha naithika karunu kihipayak gana man oyalawa ada danuwath karanawa.
